properties.name: Description
properties.description: A friendly description of the policy.

type.description: A friendly description of the policy.

properties.name: Groups
properties.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the group to attach the policy to.

type.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the group to attach the policy to.

properties.name: ManagedPolicyName
properties.description: The friendly name of the policy.

type.description: The friendly name of the policy.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: The JSON policy document that you want to use as the content for the new policy.

types.description: The JSON policy document that you want to use as the content for the new policy.
The JSON policy document that you want to use as the content for the new policy.

properties.name: Roles
properties.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the role to attach the policy to.

type.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the role to attach the policy to.

properties.name: Users
properties.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the IAM user to attach the policy to.

type.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the IAM user to attach the policy to.

properties.name: AttachmentCount
properties.description: The number of entities (users, groups, and roles) that the policy is attached to.

type.description: The number of entities (users, groups, and roles) that the policy is attached to.

properties.name: CreateDate
properties.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was created.

type.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was created.

properties.name: DefaultVersionId
properties.description: The identifier for the version of the policy that is set as the default version.

type.description: The identifier for the version of the policy that is set as the default version.

properties.name: IsAttachable
properties.description: Specifies whether the policy can be attached to an IAM user, group, or role.

type.description: Specifies whether the policy can be attached to an IAM user, group, or role.

properties.name: PermissionsBoundaryUsageCount
properties.description: The number of entities (users and roles) for which the policy is used to set the permissions boundary.

type.description: The number of entities (users and roles) for which the policy is used to set the permissions boundary.

properties.name: PolicyArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the managed policy

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the managed policy

properties.name: PolicyId
properties.description: The stable and unique string identifying the policy.

type.description: The stable and unique string identifying the policy.

properties.name: UpdateDate
properties.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was last updated.

type.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was last updated.
